title: 海绵端的插件放mod文件夹不能加载
author: kf2593766521
txt_content:
> [15:37:02] [Server thread/INFO] [FML]: FML has found a non-mod file # LibLoader.jar in your mods directory. It will now be injected into your classpath. This could severe stability issues, it should be removed if possible.
[15:37:02] [Server thread/INFO] [FML]: FML has found a non-mod file [motd标语]ServerListPlus-3.4.7-Universal.jar in your mods directory. It will now be injected into your classpath. This could severe stability issues, it should be removed if possible.

[15:37:02] [Server thread/INFO] [FML]: FML has found a non-mod file [全球市场]UniversalMarket-1.12.2-v1.3-Bug_fix_and_chinese_translation_by_Alone_and_Tollainmear_and_lookas2001.jar in your mods directory. It will now be injected into your classpath. This could severe stability issues, it should be removed if possible.

[15:37:02] [Server thread/INFO] [FML]: FML has found a non-mod file [基础插件-附属]clearall-1.1.0.jar in your mods directory. It will now be injected into your classpath. This could severe stability issues, it should be removed if possible.

反正只能加载mod不能加载插件
我也不知道咋办第一次玩海绵
希望大佬能给我解答一下给我一个满意的答复！

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content: 你的 sponge 装上了吗

replies.author: kf2593766521
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2019-7-9 23:54
你的 sponge 装上了吗
装上了

replies.author: GiNYAi
replies.txt_content:
kf2593766521 发表于 2019-7-10 00:10
装上了
发一下完整的log吧 ，我也觉得你其实根本没有装上sponge
另外可以使用一下/sponge version 检查一下状态

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
kf2593766521 发表于 2019-7-10 00:10
装上了
你输指令 /sponge:help 试试
在mod文件夹建一个新建文件夹，然后把mod装进去。把插件和mod分开试试
